category: General Assembly of Representatives and Board of Directors Regulations/Supplementary Provisions
contents: *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2016.03.21. This regulation shall come into effect from the date the Korea Sports Council completes registration of establishment, and must be reported to the first board of directors. *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2017.04.03. This regulation comes into effect from the date of resolution by the Board of Directors. *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, May 29, 2019. Article 1 (Enforcement Date) These regulations shall enter into force from the date of resolution by the Board of Directors. Article 2 (Application Measures) Notwithstanding Article 20, persons serving as directors before the enforcement of the revised regulations shall be subject to Article 26, Paragraph 5 and Article 26 of the Articles of Incorporation. It is deemed to have been constituted in accordance with Article 20 of these regulations. *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2021.10.06. (Enforcement date) This regulation shall come into effect from the date of resolution by the Board of Directors.
